data1.Desc: The project is not updated by the Git-Push-Deploy add-on if the VCS auto-deploy option is disabled
An error occurs when installing the IOTA Node application from the Marketplace
The File Synchronization add-on does not support LiteSpeed and LLSMP stacks
Redundant information in the error message if the Let’s Encrypt add-on installation fails
The WAF module for the BitNinja add-on does not work on the nodes without a public IP
An error occurs when installing both BitNinja and Let’s Encrypt add-ons
Errors in the opensearch-cluster.log file after the OpenSearch Cluster package installation
An error occurs when connecting from the Apache Python application server to the PostgreSQL database
Problems with the installation of some RPM packages on the old MariaDB versions
An error occurs when restarting Tomcat, TomEE, WildFly, and Apache Python nodes
Nodes added via horizontal scaling are not included in the MinIO Cluster
An error occurs when establishing a connection from the WildFly admin panel to the database
The sendmail process is not started within the Debian VPS container
Database credentials are missing in the email when cloning an environment with the MySQL/MariaDB auto-cluster
Data mounts are absent on the new WordPress Cluster nodes after horizontal scaling
The gd library is missing for the WordPress packages based on the LiteSpeed application server
An error occurs when changing the permalinks option for the WordPress Cluster on the LiteSpeed server with WAF enabled
After the GlusterFS cluster redeployment, nodes added via horizontal scaling are not included in the cluster

data2.Desc: The file manager tab in the dashboard does not automatically become operable after the layer restart operation is finished
A collaboration member with full rights cannot download from the shared environment via the dashboard’s file manager
An error occurs when starting the openrc-jelinit service on the alpine-based containers
An error occurs when exporting billing history from the dashboard
Incorrect escaping for the “!” symbol in the environment variable value provided via the dashboard
An error occurs when trying to install an add-on from the Marketplace on the account without any environments
Duplicated records in the configuration file after container redeployment failure
Default placeholders are not replaced in the collaboration emails
If billing history is downloaded for the specific environment and not the whole account, the filename should contain the appropriate environment name
An error occurs when loading variables or redeploying a container if the first variable in the configs is empty
An error occurs after the Spring Boot Thin Jar Builder package installation
An error occurs when a collaboration member with the ‘Cost Estimation / Billing History’ policy tries to download billing history for the shared environment
